text: Heterometrus indus, the giant forest scorpion, is a species of scorpions belonging to the family Scorpionidae. It is found only in India and Sri Lanka. It is known to as a fierce carnivorous arthropod for small animals. ==References== ==External links== * Pictures Category:Scorpionidae Category:Endemic fauna of India Category:Endemic fauna of Sri Lanka Category:Animals described in 1778
title: Heterometrus indus
